definition: to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
surname Cheng
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.english: "Xi Nan Jiao"is a transfer station. You may transfer subway line 2.
sentences.chinese: “西南角”是換乘車站，您可以換乘地鐵2號線列車。

sentences.english: "Xi Nan Jiao"is a transfer station. You may transfer subway line 2.
sentences.chinese: “西南角”是換乘車站，您可以換乘地鐵2號線列車。

sentences.english: This article trades a special study about spatial design for subway.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於地鐵換乘空間設計的一項專題研究。

sentences.english: Next Station, Hung Hom, interchange station for the West Rail Line.
sentences.chinese: 紅磡，乘客可以換乘西鐵線。

sentences.english: We have to change trains at Didcot .
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在迪科換乘火車。

sentences.english: Qingdao City Subway Ride on the 4th line and the base station is located on the west side district.
sentences.chinese: 青島市地鐵一號線和四號換乘站位於小區基地西側。

sentences.english: You should change to the No, 108 bus at Anzhen Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 你應該在安鎮橋換乘108路公共汽車。

sentences.english: Passengers may change to Ma On Shan Rail trains at Tai Wai.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以在大圍站換乘馬鞍山鐵路列車。

sentences.english: We have to change here for an express.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在這裏換乘快車。

sentences.english: This train connects with the one leaving for London half an hour later.
sentences.chinese: 坐這班火車可換乘半小時後開往倫敦的那趟車。

sentences.english: This is a cheap air, ticket also transfer activity book of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 這次又是換乘廉價航空，票也是歐遊網訂的。

sentences.english: Dongdan station is a transfer station.
Next station Xingong, interchange station for Line 4.
sentences.chinese: 下一站，新宮，乘客可換乘地鐵四號線。

definition: to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
rail station/bus stop/CL:處|处[chu4],個|个[ge4]
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
subway/metro
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
terminus
a turntable
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
website
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle

to change (train or plane)/transfer/correspondence
